actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to entitle any veteran who is discharged or released from active duty by reason of hardship to 36 months of educational assistance.

summary.text: Entitles any veteran who is discharged or released from active duty by reason of hardship to 36 months of educational assistance. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 16661)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to entitle any veteran who is discharged or released from active duty by reason of hardship to 36 months of educational assistance.
